name: KineticSecureHome
0:
”Alexa, arm away mode”
”Alexa, arm night mode”
”Alexa, disarm the security system”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Kinetic Secure Home is your home security solution for protecting what matters most. With our Alexa integration, controlling your Kinetic Secure Home system becomes even easier. Here are some of the commands you can use with Kinetic Secure Home:

- Alexa, arm home mode
- Alexa, arm away mode
- Alexa, disarm the security system
- Alexa, is the back door open?
- Alexa, is my security system armed?

To use this skill you will need a hub and sensors connected to a Kinetic account. Visit www.gokinetic.com for more information about our devices and professional monitoring options.
